event_name: 2016 Championship Game of the WSA Future's Cup

players_involved.name: Caroline
players_involved.action: receives throw-in, controls and finds Hannah

players_involved.name: Hannah Landrum
players_involved.action: quickly plays the ball out wide to Langley

players_involved.name: Langley
players_involved.action: receives in space, tries to get in behind with the dribble before the ball is cleared

players_involved.name: Sydney Shepelwich
players_involved.action: picks up the clearance, dribbles past a closing player and takes a shot from deep, just wide

narrative: Throw-in to {Caroline} — she controls and finds {Hannah Landrum}, who quickly plays it out wide to {Langley} in space. {Langley} tries to get in behind with the dribble but the ball gets cleared. {Sydney Shepelwich} picks it up, dribbles by an oncoming player and lets one fly from deep — just wide of the goal!
caption_hook: Keep the pressure on. Keep shooting.
